dct_title_s: Africa : designed to accompany Cornell's high school geography
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. On verso: Greece, Turkey in Asia and Persia; India. New York : D. Appelton & Co. ... , c1856. Insets: Liberia; Southern part of Africa; Map of Isthmus of Suez. "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1855 by S. S. Cornell ... "
dct_publisher_sm: New York : D. Appelton & Co. ... , c1855.
